alert.note: Alert for South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued November 25 at 8:45AM PST until November 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 could result in frost formation Sunday morning. * WHERE...Frost conditions near the coast and inland across Coos County Sunday morning, including Myrtle Point, Coos Bay, Coquille, and Powers on Saturday. * WHEN...Frost Advisory, from 4 AM to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
